experience-text: With six years of experience in customer service and sales, I bring a customer-centric approach with the motto 'Keep it Simple' to the development of web applications as a Junior Web Developer. My goal is to create user-friendly solutions that are intuitive and provide a seamless user experience. Through an intensive bootcamp, I have acquired the latest web technologies and am ready to apply my skills to develop innovative and engaging web applications.

check-out: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
DA-Bubble-description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
El Pollo Loco-description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
Join-description: The project is a Slack clone that allows users to create channels and exchange direct messages.
headline: Contact
about: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
